name: John Stuart Mill
office: Member of Parliament for City and Westminster
school_tradition: Empiricism, Utilitarianism, Consequentialism, Psychologism, Classical liberalism
main_interests: Political philosophy, ethics, economics, inductive logic
influences: Marmontel http://www.gutenberg.org/cache/epub/10378/pg10378.html "The Project Gutenberg EBook of Autobiography, by John Stuart Mill" gutenberg.org. Retrieved 11 June 2013.
